net_price.description: The total net price of the order.

currency.description: The currency set on the order.

num_products.description: Number of products. Sample products, coupons, discounts, fees are excluded.

num_categories.description: Number of categories in the order.

num_recipes.description: Number of recipes in the order.

num_coupons.description: Number of coupons applied to the order.

payment_method.description: Name of the payment method last used on the order.

num_order_changes.description: Number of changes made on the order.

num_orders.description: Number of orders the user have.
